Title.Language: Litany of Those Who are Standing in this Place

Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~n/eto~hi e~ratou m~paima ouoh etoi n~s~v/r n~twbh neman.
Remember, O Lord, those who are standing in this place and who are partners with us in prayerâ€”

Twbh e~jen n/eto~hi e~ratou m~paima ouoh etoi n~s~v/r n~twbh neman: hina n~te Pi,~rictoc Pennou] a~reh e~rwou: n~tefrwic e~rwou: n~tefswp e~rof n~noutwbh: ouoh n~tefnai nwou: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.

Pray for those who are standing in this place and who are partners with us in prayer, that Christ our God may keep them and guard them, receive their prayers to Himself, and have mercy upon them, and forgive us our sins.

Nenio] nem nenc~n/ou: nem p~cwjp n~n/etqen mai niben n~te ]oikoumen/.
our fathers and brethren, and the rest who are in every place of the world.

Areh de e~rwou neman qen hanparembol/ n~te hanjom euouab.
And keep them with us by the armies of the holy powers,
Ouoh nahmen e~bolha nicoynef et[er/out n~,~rwm n~te pidiaboloc.
and save us from the fiery, blazing darts of the Devil,

Nem jorjc niben n~dia~bolikon: nem pivas n~te piy~maio~ n~nouj.
from every diabolic ambush, and from the trap of false justification.
